MeetingList.SERVICE_NAME:
select a.*,
IF(MeetingPeriod = 'day','Every Day 09:00 (except Sat., Sun)',IF(MeetingPeriod = 'week','Every Week 09:00 in Monday','Every Month 09:00 in First Monday')) as MeetingPeriodName,
IF(Status ='Y' ,'Yes, Lets make a meeting','Do not make a meeting') as StatusName,
(Select RoleName From Role Where RoleCode = a.MakerRoleCode) as MakerRoleName
from ProjectScrumMeetingConfig a
where PMCode = ?
